### R Package Development

- R Packages [@wickham2023rpkgs] - comprehensive guide to R package development
- Tidyverse design guide [@wickham2023tidydesign] - principles for designing R packages and APIs that are intuitive, composable, and consistent with tidyverse philosophy
- [usethis documentation](https://usethis.r-lib.org/) - workflow automation for R projects
- [devtools documentation](https://devtools.r-lib.org/) - essential development tools
- [pkgdown documentation](https://pkgdown.r-lib.org/) - create package websites
- [testthat documentation](https://testthat.r-lib.org/) - unit testing framework

### General R Programming

- R for Data Science [@wickham2023r4ds] - learn data science with the tidyverse
- Advanced R [@wickham2019advr] - deep dive into R programming and internals

### Shiny Development

- Mastering Shiny [@wickham2021shiny] - comprehensive guide to building web applications with Shiny
